PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2016-03422016-05-13,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ISED
ActCanada Business Corporations Act
Canada Cooperatives Act
Canada Not-for-profit Corporations Act
SubjectRegulations Amending Certain Department of Industry Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending CERTAIN DEPARTMENT OF INDUSTRY REGULATIONS in order to (1) address the issue raised by the Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations; (2) update the name of the standards handbook for accounting purposes; (3) repeal spent regulations; and (4) correct a cross-reference error.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2016-0098 Publication Date: 2016-06-01
AttachmentsAttachment

precis: Regulations Amending CERTAIN DEPARTMENT OF INDUSTRY REGULATIONS in order to (1) address the issue raised by the Standing Joint Committee for the Scrutiny of Regulations; (2) update the name of the standards handbook for accounting purposes; (3) repeal spent regulations; and (4) correct a cross-reference error.
